title: Plan Anthropic Claude provider support
description:
Plan integration of Anthropic Claude API as a provider option alongside Gemini, Ollama, OpenAI. 

Key considerations:
- API endpoint: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages
- Auth: x-api-key header (ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env var)
- Models: claude-opus-4, claude-sonnet-4, claude-haiku
- Request format: {model, messages[], max_tokens, stream}
- Response format: {content[], role, stop_reason}
- Tool calling: tools[] with input_schema, tool_use blocks
- Rate limiting headers: anthropic-ratelimit-* 
- Streaming: text/event-stream SSE

Implementation tasks:
1. Add sage-anthropic-api-key defcustom
2. Add 'anthropic to sage-provider choice
3. Implement sage--format-anthropic-request
4. Implement sage--parse-anthropic-response  
5. Handle tool_use and tool_result blocks
6. Add anthropic to rate limit defaults
